INCORRECT_ETH_SENT().details: Thrown when the amount of Ether sent to the contract is incorrect

INCORRECT_ITEM().details: Thrown when the requested item does not exists in store

INVALID_PARAMETER().details: Thrown when the passed parameter is invalid

OUT_OF_STOCK().details: Thrown when the requested item is no longer available

addItem(uint256,uint256,uint256).details: Only the contract owner can perform this operation

balanceOf(address,uint256).details: See {IERC1155-balanceOf}. Requirements: - `account` cannot be the zero address.

balanceOfBatch(address[],uint256[]).details: See {IERC1155-balanceOfBatch}. Requirements: - `accounts` and `ids` must have the same length.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params._itemIds: : Array of items to be purchased
params._quantities: : Array of quantity for each item to be purchased

params._itemIds: : Array of items to be redeemed
params._quantities: : Array of quantity for each item to be redeemed

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setToken(address).details: Only the contract owner can perform this operation

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

updateItem(uint256,uint256,uint256,uint2.details: Only the contract owner can perform this operation

params._itemId: : Identifier of the item to be updated

uri(uint256).details: See {IERC1155MetadataURI-uri}. This implementation returns the same URI for *all* token types. It relies on the token type ID substitution mechanism https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-1155#metadata[defined in the EIP]. Clients calling this function must replace the `\{id\}` substring with the actual token type ID.

withdraw(address).details: Only the contract owner can perform this operation

AB_TOKEN.details: Anotherblock Token used to purchase items in store

items.details: Stores the items details for a given item ID

nbItems.details: Total number of items in store

addItem(uint256,uint256,uint256).notice: Add new purchasable item to the store

redeem(uint256[],uint256[]).notice: Redeem the physical item from the store

updateItem(uint256,uint256,uint256,uint2.notice: Update existing purchasable item in the store

withdraw(address).notice: Withdraw Ether from this contract to the given address
